attributes.action: stop the introduction of id cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the introduction will be an infringement on privacy, and an unwanted move towards a big brother society where constant, constricting, surveillance is a fact of life.

rejection.details: This petition ovrelaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=id+card
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
